description:
*Available in: English, French, German, & Spanish*

At a sports game? Or somewhere with your friends? Want to show off your patriotism for your country? Well now you can! With this app, you can show off the American Flag to anyone, anywhere. Just open the app, tap the button when you're ready, and a beautiful American Flag waves on your screen!

Check out our other apps:
- Aquarium
- Fireplace
- Beach
- Rick Roll
- Solar System
- It's a Trap!
- Metal Gear Solid Soundboard
- Objection!
